scripts.build:chrome: echo Building Chrome... && xcopy src\*.* dist\chrome\ /S /I /Y && xcopy src\icons\*.* dist\chrome\icons\ /S /I /Y && copy manifest\manifest.json dist\chrome\ && copy node_modules\webextension-polyfill\dist\browser-polyfill.js dist\chrome\
scripts.build:firefox: echo Building Firefox... && xcopy src\*.* dist\firefox\ /S /I /Y && xcopy src\icons\*.* dist\firefox\icons\ /S /I /Y && copy manifest\manifest.firefox.json dist\firefox\manifest.json && copy node_modules\webextension-polyfill\dist\browser-polyfill.js dist\firefox\
